name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech

Proficient in building **RESTful APIs** to deliver seamless integration and enhance application functionality. Demonstrates a strong understanding of **PowerShell**, **Power Apps**, and **Power Automate** for automating workflows and improving operational efficiency.

Experienced in Agile development methodologies, showcasing exceptional problem-solving skills and effective communication abilities to foster collaboration within teams. Additional expertise in frontend and backend development utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, further enhancing the capability to deliver innovative applications across diverse industries.
